doc.summary: Renders the given <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/render/target/RenderJob">job</ref> into an image.
doc.text: Renders the given <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/render/target/RenderJob">job</ref> into an image. The future will be completed  when the next frame of the game is rendered.

doc.summary: Helper to render scenes into images in the context of minecraft.
doc.text: Helper to render scenes into images in the context of minecraft.
